title: ATFutura Maxi-Bold - Anyone know where I could get it?
content:
Hi there,

I'm currently looking for this font:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atfutura-maxi/atfutura-maxi-bold/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134559/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atfutura-maxi/atfutura-maxi-bold/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/atfutura-maxi/atfutura-maxi-bold/")

ATFutura Maxi-Bold

but cannot seem to get/buy it anywhere. Would anyone have any leads/links?

Cheers,

Paul.
author: papadimitriou

comments.content: As Agfa was bought by MonoType I would think that [PL Futura Maxi](http://web.archive.org/web/20110218134559/http:/www.identifont.com/show?4B7) is the actual right one.
